channel.title: Moparscape (i mean a real game)
channel.description:
why the fuck dont we make a private server called moparscape? is it because were scared of jagex? :eek:
Im sure if we all get together we can make something 100x better than runescape (not combat wise ;D)

item.title: Moparscape (i mean a real game)

item.description:
@f_2_p_2_p_f wrote:

Along the lines of what mopar wants is for a great source to be released since all the
Ones that are ever close to great get too large & then get taken down.
As for us all making one server & just calling it moparscape I’m sure thats mopars servers name to come.

Rip Ayudascape (xx nub xx) was tired of running it with all the annoying people so he
shut down & released it.

item.title: Moparscape (i mean a real game)
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:24, topic:335637”][quote author=TncNinja link=topic=432017.msg3171869#msg3171869 date=1270505675]
a long time ago there was a private server… then they took it down cause they got scared by jagex i was there with the owner when that happened cause a few jagex members threatened them
[/quote]

That never happened. MoparScape was always and will always be a client, not a server.

However, I WILL run a server as soon as a decent one gets released, like the one I am paying for here:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,345848.0.html[/quote]

If you hosts a Private Server I’d play that

item.title: Moparscape (i mean a real game)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:15, topic:335637”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=432017.msg3171583#msg3171583 date=1270490454]
Eh, I actually would like to see one giant collab server for Mopar. If everyone could cooperate, it would be very winsome.
[/quote]If you’re depending on stability, you’re out of luck.

[quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=432017.msg3171397#msg3171397 date=1270476154]
All we need to do is hand pickout the people which are pro and would do a pro job and mopar just has to pay $20 / month for vps unless he has one or he wants a 8gb dedi…

I would pick SilentCJ as modeler
[/quote]If you’re going to hand pick coders, you’re not going to find many that will fit moparisthebest’s expectations to make a server. Most of the active “pro” RSPS coders are on mitb forums.

Sorry if I sound a bit pessimistic about all of this lol. I’m just trying to tell the truth. There’s a slim, slim chance that this project will be completed. You have to understand the potential that zstars had, and then look at the group of users we have now… It’s a bit off on the ratio scale.[/quote]
He will end up dumping all of us and hiring professionals -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape (i mean a real game)
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:14, topic:335637”]Eh, I actually would like to see one giant collab server for Mopar. If everyone could cooperate, it would be very winsome.[/quote]If you’re depending on stability, you’re out of luck.

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:12, topic:335637”]All we need to do is hand pickout the people which are pro and would do a pro job and mopar just has to pay $20 / month for vps unless he has one or he wants a 8gb dedi…

I would pick SilentCJ as modeler :D[/quote]If you’re going to hand pick coders, you’re not going to find many that will fit moparisthebest’s expectations to make a server. Most of the active “pro” RSPS coders are on mitb forums.

Sorry if I sound a bit pessimistic about all of this lol. I’m just trying to tell the truth. There’s a slim, slim chance that this project will be completed. You have to understand the potential that zstars had, and then look at the group of users we have now… It’s a bit off on the ratio scale.

Read full topic
